title: US-Israel Strike Iran's Konarak Naval Base, 3 Ships Sunk
summary_full: Iran continues to reel from the joint US, Israeli attacks. Latest satellite imagery, released yesterday, appears to show damaged buildings at Konarak naval base in southern Iran along the Gulf of Oman.
summary_public: Iran continues to reel from the joint US, Israeli attacks. Latest satellite imagery, released yesterday, appears to show damaged buildings at Konarak naval base in southern Iran along the Gulf of Oman.

IL.label: negative
